fixed_skill.desc: Deal Electric damage to all foes equal to 112.0%/117.6%/123.2% of Attack. When Thunder Lord's Majesty reaches 3 stacks, 80% chance to inflict Shock on all foes for 2 turns.
fixed_skill.name: Thunder Caller

innate_skill.desc: Decrease SP cost of skills by 6%.
innate_skill.name: Spell Master IV

innate_skill.desc: Deal Electric damage to all foes equal to 64.8/68.0/71.3% of Attack. 36.0/37.8/39.6% chance to inflict Shock for 2 turns.
innate_skill.name: Wild Thunder

passive_skill.desc: Increase critical damage by 34.9%. Each time an ally uses an Electric skill, Resonance, or Highlight, gain 1 Thunder Lord's Majesty stack. Stacks up to 3 times. Lasts for 1 turn. When user deals Electric damage, and Thunder Lord's Majesty is at 3 stacks, increase all foes' Electric damage taken by 8%, and Electric critical damage taken by 12%. Lasts for 2 turns.
passive_skill.name: Thunder Lord's Majesty

passive_skill.desc: Increase critical damage by 34.9%. Each time an ally uses an Electric skill, Resonance, or Highlight, gain 1 Thunder Lord's Majesty stack. Stacks up to 3 times. Lasts for 2 turns. When user deals Electric damage, and Thunder Lord's Majesty is at 3 stacks, increase all foes' Electric damage taken by 8%, and Electric critical damage taken by 12%. Lasts for 2 turns.
passive_skill.name: Thunder Lord's Majesty I

passive_skill.desc: Increase critical damage by 34.9%. Each time an ally uses an Electric skill, Resonance, or Highlight, gain 1 Thunder Lord's Majesty stack. Stacks up to 3 times. Lasts for 2 turns. When user deals Electric damage, and Thunder Lord's Majesty is at 3 stacks, increase all foes' Electric damage taken by 12%, and Electric critical damage taken by 12%. Lasts for 2 turns.
passive_skill.name: Thunder Lord's Majesty II

passive_skill.desc: Increase critical damage by 34.9%. Each time an ally uses an Electric skill, Resonance, or Highlight, gain 1 Thunder Lord's Majesty stack. Stacks up to 3 times. Lasts for 2 turns. When user deals Electric damage, and Thunder Lord's Majesty is at 3 stacks, increase all foes' Electric damage taken by 12%, and Electric critical damage taken by 20%. Lasts for 2 turns.
passive_skill.name: Thunder Lord's Majesty III

showtime_skill.desc: Deal Electric damage to all foes equal to 180.0%/192.6%/205.2% of Attack.
showtime_skill.name: Highlight
